segments.text: What a surprising sight in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on full blast, water cascading over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even glance at it, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, but she keeps drying away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes wait on the counter, innocent bystanders.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on the stool, looking precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is reaching up, excited for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief is oddly charming amid the hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside seems so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected such a mix of calm and chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a story frozen in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
